official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that services furnished by a clinical social worker are covered under part B of the medicare program when furnished by a health maintenance organization to a member of that organization.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the supplementary medical insurance program (part B of title XVIII) for services furnished by a clinical social worker to a member of a health maintenance organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide that services furnished by a clinical social worker are covered under part B of the medicare program when furnished by a health maintenance organization to a member of that organization.
